title: Rationale, in silico docking, ADMET profile, design, synthesis and cytotoxicity evaluations of phthalazine derivatives as VEGFR-2 inhibitors and apoptosis inducers
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27110-27121
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04956J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Hatem Hussein Bayoumi, Mohamed-Kamal Ibrahim, Mohammed A. Dahab, Fathalla Khedr, Khaled El-Adl
New phthalazine derivatives as vascular endothelial growth factor receptor-2 (VEGFR-2) inhibitors were synthesized joined to different spacers including pyrazole, α,β-unsaturated ketonic fragment, pyrimidinone and/or pyrimidinthione.
